ComicInfo.Summary:
As Dracula undergoes a violent physical transformation that might result in the extermination of the human race, Blade and his team of vampire hunters race toward Castle Dracula only to find themselves under assault by the first wave of alpha-vampires who are sworn to protect their master.
The vampire hunters approach Dracula's castle but at a high cost. Three lose their lives...
ComicInfo.Title: Part Three
